name: Codecademy Group Redesign - For new UI
description: Totally updates the style of groups on Codecademy making it fit in with the new interface #Chrome Extension here, the extension adds a link to the Group Feed back in.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.codecademy.com/groups") {
.full-width-container {	padding-bottom: 2.5em;	background: #f5f5f5;	font-family: 'DINRoundOT-Light';}.header-gray.group-cover {	background-color: #e6e7e8;}div.accessory-links a.groups-faq, div.accessory-links a.browse-groups {	font-size: 15px;	color: #59A1C7;}div.accessory-links a.groups-faq:hover, div.accessory-links a.browse-groups:hover {	color: #1F3F58;}div.accessory-links a.browse-groups span.icon-page-jump {	display: none;}.group-cover .group-name {	font-size: 30px;}.group-cover .group-name span.accessiblity-icon {	top: 12px;}body.groups .tabs {	width: 900px;}body.groups .tabs-content {	width: 880px;}body.groups .side-right {	width: 240px;}.tabs a.tab.active {	border-color: #59A1C7;}.tabs a.tab {	height: 24px;}.tabs .count {	background: #59A1C7;	border-radius: 0;	padding: 4px 7.5px;	font-size: 12px;}.blue-label {	background: #f65a5b;	border-radius: 0;}#group-content, ul.discussion-items {	background-color: #f5f5f5;}ul.discussion-items {	border: 0 none;}ul.discussion-items li {	border-top: 0 none;	margin-bottom: 1px;}.discussion-item .icon-corner-pinned {	top: 0;}ul.discussion-items li a {	background-color: #fff;}ul.discussion-items li:hover a {	background-color: #39D1B4;}.discussion-item .discussion-name {	font-size: 17px;	font-family: 'DINRoundOT-Light';}ul.discussion-items li:hover a .cell-body p {	color: white;}ul.discussion-items li a .cell-body .timestamp {	font-size: 14px;}ul.discussion-items li:hover a .cell-body .timestamp {	color: whitesmoke;}div.discussion-items-container ul.discussion-items {	border-radius: 0;}.discussion-item .discussion-count-bubble {	padding: 5px;	border-radius: 0;	top: 25px;	background: #e6e7e8;	color: #1F3F58;}.icon-corner-pinned {	position: absolute;	width: 10px;	background: #59A1C7;	height: 70px;	top: 0;	left: 0;}.avatar.border {	border-radius:1000px;	border: 0 none;	padding: 0;}.group-cover .cover-image-container .group-image, .group-cover .cover-image-container {	border-radius:1000px;	border: 0;}.cc-pagination {	border: 0 none !important;	background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;	box-shadow: none !important;}.cc-pagination .previous, .cc-pagination .next, .cc-pagination .disabled {	background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;	background-image: none !important;}.cc-pagination a.active {	border: 0 none !important;	background: none !important;	color: #39D1B4 !important;}.cc-pagination a:hover {	border: 0 none !important;	color: #39D1B4 !important;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:first-child {	background-color: #1F3F58;	height: 15px;	width: 185px;	margin-left: 20px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:first-child a {	background: #1F3F58;	width: 225px;	height: 20px;	padding: 0;	color: white;	border: 0 none;	padding-top: 7.5px;	padding-bottom: 7.5px;	font-size: 13.5px;	border-radius: 0;	position: absolute;	top: 0;	left: 0;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:first-child:hover a{	background: #59A1C7;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:first-child span.icon-plus {	top: 5px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) {	border-top: 0 none;	padding: 1px 0 5px 5px;	margin-bottom: 10px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) input.discussions-search.search-input {	border-radius: 0;	width: 225px;	text-align: center;	margin-left: 15px;	margin-top: 5px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) input.discussions-search.search-input:focus {	border-color: #59A1C7;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3),div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li {	border-top: 0 none;	max-height: 650px;	overflow-y: auto;	width: 240px;	padding-top: 0;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .user-card,div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li  {	background: white;	width: 225px;	height: 40px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .user-card:hover,div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li:hover {	background: #f65a5b;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .user-card:hover .cell-body a.name,div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li:hover a.name {	color: white;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .user-card:hover .cell-body span.user-points {	color: whitesmoke;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .user-card a.cell-image.avatar {	width: 225px;	height: 40px;	background: rgb(255, 255, 255) transparent;	position: absolute;	background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);	z-index: 1;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .user-card a.cell-image.avatar img,div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li a img.avatar {	border-radius: 1000px;	width: 33px;	height: 33px;	margin: 2.5px 2.5px 0 10px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .user-card div.cell-body,div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li a.name {	height: 100%;	text-align: center;	margin-left: 38px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .user-card div.cell-body a.name,div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li a.name {	color: #204056;	width: 100%;	font-size: 15px;	margin-top: 2.5px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .user-card div.cell-body span.user-points {	color: #59A1C7;	border: 0 none;	padding: 0;	background: none;}span.user-points:before {	display: none;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .moderators-sidebar-header ~ .user-card, div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li {	height: 30px;	margin-top: 1px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .moderators-sidebar-header ~ .user-card a.cell-image.avatar {	height: 30px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .moderators-sidebar-header ~ .user-card a.cell-image.avatar img, div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li a img.avatar {	width: 25px;	height: 25px;	margin: 2px 0 2px 7.5px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .moderators-sidebar-header ~ .user-card div.cell-body a.name, div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li a.name {	margin-top: 5px;	font-size: 13px;}div.side-right.discussions-sidebar .cell:nth-child(3) .moderators-sidebar-header ~ .user-card div.cell-body span.user-points {	display: none;}body.groups .side-left h4, body.groups .side-right h4 {	font-size: 15px;	margin-bottom: 7.5px;}div.side-right ::-webkit-scrollbar {    width: 10px;}div.side-right ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {	background-color: #f5f5f5;} div.side-right ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {    border-radius: 3px;	background-color: #e6e7e8;}div.side-right ::-webkit-scrollbar-button {  height: 10px;  width: 10px;  background: #cfcfd0;   display: none;}div.tabs-content.cf div.discussions-sidebar.side-right div.cell div.cell-image {	display: none;}div.tabs-content.cf div.discussions-sidebar.side-right div.cell:first-child  div.cell-body {	position: initial;}div.tabs-content.cf div.discussions-sidebar.side-right div.cell:first-child  div.cell-body > h4, div.tabs-content.cf div.discussions-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(2)  div.cell-body > h4 {	display: none;}div.tabs-content.cf div.discussions-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(2)  div.cell-body  {	width: 240px;}div.tabs-content.cf div.discussions-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(2)  div.cell-body a.bttn  {	background: #1F3F58;	width: 225px;	height: 20px;	padding: 0;	color: white;	border: 0 none;	padding-top: 7.5px;	padding-bottom: 7.5px;	font-size: 13.5px;	border-radius: 0;	margin-left: 15px;}div.tabs-content.cf div.discussions-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(2)  div.cell-body a.bttn:hover {	background: #f65a5b;}div.tabs-content.cf div.discussions-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(3) > a {	display: inline-block;	height: 40px;	width: 40px;}div.tabs-content.cf div.discussions-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(3) > a:hover {	background: #39D1B4;}div.tabs-content.cf div.discussions-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(3) > a > img.avatar {	border-radius: 1000px;	margin: 2.5px;	padding: 0;}div.discussions.main-left div.discussion-entry div.entry-container {	border-radius: 0;	background: white;}div.discussions.main-left div.discussion-entry div.entry-container div.user-info {	margin: 15px 0;}div.discussions.main-left div.discussion-entry div.entry-container div.user-info a.username {	font-size: 17.5px;}div.discussions.main-left div.discussion-entry div.entry-container a.avatar, li.response-item div.response-entry div.entry-container a.avatar, div.comments-container ul.comments-list li.comment-item a.avatar  {	padding: 0;}div.discussions.main-left div.discussion-entry div.entry-container a.avatar img,li.response-item div.response-entry div.entry-container a.avatar img,div.comments-container ul.comments-list li.comment-item a.avatar img, div.discussions.main-left div.discussion-entry div.entry-container a.avatar,li.response-item div.response-entry div.entry-container a.avatar,div.comments-container ul.comments-list li.comment-item a.avatar {	border-radius: 1000px;	padding: 0;}div.discussions.main-left div.discussion-entry div.entry-container div.user-info p,div.response-entry div.entry-container div.cell-body div.user-info  p {	display: inline-block;}div.discussions.main-left div.discussion-entry div.entry-container div.user-info p span.user-points, div.response-entry div.entry-container div.cell-body div.user-info  span.user-points {	color: #59A1C7;	border: 0 none;	padding: 0;	background: none;	padding-left: 10px;}div.discussions.main-left div.discussion-entry div.entry-container div.user-info p span.user-points:before, div.response-entry div.entry-container div.cell-body div.user-info  span.user-points:before {	display: block;	background-color: #59A1C7;}li.response-item div.response-entry div.entry-container div.cell-body div.user-info a {	font-size: 16px;}li.response-item p {	font-size: 15px;	font-family: 'DINRoundOT-Light';}li.response-item div.comments-container ul.comments-list li.comment-item a.username {	font-size: 13px;	padding-right: 5px;}li.response-item div.comments-container a.view-more {	text-align: center;	color: #1F3F58;	font-weight: bold;	background: #e6e7e8;	padding: 2.5px;}li.response-item div.comments-container a.view-more:hover {	color: white !important;	background: #59A1C7;}li.response-item div.comments-container {	border: none;	border-radius: 0;}div.comments-container:before,  .comments-container:after {	border-bottom-color: rgba(222,222,222,0);	bottom: 0;}li.response-item div.comments-container ul.comments-list {	margin: 0;}li.response-item div.comments-container ul.comments-list li.comment-item {	margin: 0;	padding: 10px;	border-bottom: 1px solid #f5f5f5;}body.groups div.comments-new {	background: #e6e7e8;	border-top: 1px solid #d2d2d2;	margin: 0;	text-align: center;	padding: 2.5px;}body.groups div.comments-new:hover {	background: #39D1B4;}body.groups div.comments-new:hover a.expand-prompt  {	color: white !important;}body.groups div.comments-new a.expand-prompt {	color: #1F3F58;}body.groups div.comments-new a.expand-prompt span.icon-comment-bubble {	display: none;}body.groups div.comments-new.expanded {	background: #e6e7e8;}body.groups div.comments-new.expanded {	background: #e6e7e8;	padding: 10px;}body.groups div.comments-new.expanded img{	border-radius: 1000px;}body.groups div.comments-new.expanded div.cell-body textarea {	width: 100%;	max-width: 100%;	font-family: 'DINRoundOT-Light';}body.groups div.comments-new.expanded div.cell-body textarea:focus {	border-color: #59A1C7;}body.groups div.comments-new.expanded div.cell-body button.create-comment {	font-family: 'DINRoundOT-Light';	background: #1F3F58;	padding: 5px 0;	color: white;	border: 0 none;	border-radius: 0;}body.groups div.comments-new.expanded div.cell-body button.create-comment:hover {	background: #59A1C7;}div.modal-content div.confirm-modal {	border-radius: 0;	font-family: 'DINRoundOT-Light';	height: 80px;}div.modal-content div.confirm-modal div.message {	margin-top: -5px;}div.modal-content div.confirm-modal div.footer {	width: 400px;	position: absolute;	left: 0;	bottom: 0;	background: #1F3F58;}div.modal-content div.confirm-modal div.footer a {	width: 199px;	padding: 5px 0;	border: 0;	border-radius: 0;	float: left;	background: #1F3F58;	color: white;	border-right: 1px solid white;}div.modal-content div.confirm-modal div.footer a.yes {	width: 50%;	border-right: 0;}div.modal-content div.confirm-modal div.footer a.yes:hover {	background: #f65a5b;}div.modal-content div.confirm-modal div.footer a.no:hover {	background: #39D1B4;}div.entry-editor {	border-radius: 0;} div.entry-editor div.editor-main {	text-align: center;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main img.avatar {	margin-left: -10px;	margin-top: -12.5px;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body div.wmd-panel #wmd-button-bar {	margin-left: auto;	margin-right: auto;	width: 375px;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body div.wmd-panel textarea.entry-field {	font-family: DINRoundOT-Light;	max-width: 528px;	height: 110px;	width: 541px;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body textarea:focus {	border-color: #59A1C7;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body input {	font-family: DINRoundOT-Light;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body input:focus {	border-color: #59A1C7;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body div.controls {	text-align: center;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body div.controls button {	border: 0;	font-family: 'DINRoundOT-Light';	border-radius: 0;	background: #1F3F58;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body div.controls button:hover {	background: #39D1B4;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body div.controls span.cancel-content {	font-family: 'DINRoundOT-Light';}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body div.controls span.cancel-content a.cancel {	border: 0;	border-radius: 0;	color: white;	font-weight: bold;	background: #1F3F58;	font-size: 12px;	padding: 5px 16px 8px 17px;}div.entry-editor div.editor-main div.cell-body div.controls span.cancel-content a.cancel:hover {	background: #f65a5b;}div.entry-editor p.entry-preview-heading  {	font-family: 'DINRoundOT-Light';	font-size: 13px;	background: #f5f5f5;	border-color: #e6e7e8;	margin-bottom: 0;}div.entry-editor p.entry-preview-heading a.markdown-modal-trigger {	color: #59A1C7;}div.entry-editor p.entry-preview-heading a.markdown-modal-trigger:hover {	color: #1F3F58;}.entry-container .edit-entry {	border: none;	background: none;	opacity: 0.5;}.entry-container .edit-entry:hover {	opacity: 1;	background: none;}div.cover-image-container form.edit-group-image {	width: 100%;	height: 100%;	top: 0;	margin: 0;}div.cover-image-container form.edit-group-image a.upload-btn {	margin-left: 15px;	background: #f5f5f5;	padding-right: 0;}div.container div.tabs-content div.activity-side-left {	display: none;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container {	border: none;	width: 700px;	float: none;	margin-left: 100px;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container li.feed-item {	background: white;	border-bottom: 1px solid #f5f5f5;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container li.feed-item span.cell-image {	display: none;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container li.feed-item div.cell-body div.feed-header {	margin-left: 50px;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container li.feed-item div.cell-body div.cell-image {	margin-right: 15px;	margin-top: -25px;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container li.feed-item div.cell-body div.cell-image span.avatar, div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container li.feed-item div.cell-body div.cell-image span.avatar img {	border-radius: 1000px;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container li.feed-item div.cell-body div.cell-body p {	font-family: 'DINRoundOT-Light';	font-size: 15px;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container div.no-activity-container {	text-align: center;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container li.feed-item div.cell-body div.cell-body div.feed-footer a.respond-link {	margin-left: -120px;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container li.feed-item a {	color: #59A1C7;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container li.feed-item a:hover {	color: #1F3F58;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container a.feed-load-more {	display: block;	margin: 0;	border-radius: 0;	border: 0;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container a.feed-load-more:hover {	color: white;	background: #39D1B4;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container div.cell-body div.cell-body a.expand-text.toggle-class {	border: none;	width: 0;	height: 0;	border-left: 10px solid transparent;	border-right: 10px solid transparent;	border-top: 10px solid #e6e7e8;	background: white;	margin-top: 5px;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container div.cell-body div.cell-body.open a.expand-text.toggle-class {	border-top: none;	border-bottom: 10px solid #e6e7e8;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container div.cell-body div.cell-body a.expand-text.toggle-class:hover {	border-bottom-color: #59A1C7;	border-top-color: #59A1C7;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-right.feed-container div.cell-body div.cell-body a.expand-text.toggle-class span {	display: none;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-left div.module.neutral.cell {	background: white;	border-radius: 0;}div.container div.tabs-content div.main-left div.module.neutral.cell p {	margin-bottom: 0;}div.container div.tabs-content div.about-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(1) {	background-color: #1F3F58;	height: 15px;	width: 185px;	margin-left: 20px;	margin-bottom: 20px;}div.container div.tabs-content div.about-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(1) a.bttn-group-membership {	background: #1F3F58;	width: 225px;	height: 35px;	padding: 0;	color: white;	border: 0 none;	padding-top: 2px;	font-size: 13.5px;	border-radius: 0;	position: absolute;	top: 0;	left: 0;}div.container div.tabs-content div.about-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(1) a.bttn-group-membership span.light-text {	color: whitesmoke;}div.container div.tabs-content div.about-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(1) a.bttn-group-membership:hover {	background: #f65a5b;	cursor: pointer;}div.container div.tabs-content div.about-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(1) a.bttn-group-membership.can_join:hover {	background: #39D1B4;}div.container div.tabs-content div.about-sidebar.side-right div.cell:nth-child(2)  {	border: none;	padding-top: 0;	max-height: 450px;	overflow-y: auto;	overflow-x: hidden;	width: 240px;}div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li {	margin-bottom: 0;}div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li a {	width: 225px;	height: 30px;	position: absolute;}div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li a img.avatar {	padding: 0;}div.side-right.about-sidebar .cell:nth-child(2) li a:nth-child(2) {	text-align: center;	margin-left: 0;	margin-top: 0;	width: 225px;	height: 25px;	padding-top: 5px;}div.tabs-content div.main-left ul.members-list li.user-card {	background: white;	border-radius: 1000px;	font-size: 12px;}div.tabs-content div.main-left ul.members-list li.user-card:hover {	background: #39D1B4;}div.tabs-content div.main-left ul.members-list li.user-card:hover, div.tabs-content div.main-left ul.members-list li.user-card:hover div.cell-body a.name {	color: white;}div.tabs-content div.main-left ul.members-list li.user-card:hover div.cell-body span.user-points {	color: whitesmoke;}div.tabs-content div.main-left ul.members-list li.user-card a.avatar, div.tabs-content div.main-left ul.members-list li.user-card li.user-card div.cell-body div.title {	position: absolute;}div.tabs-content div.main-left ul.members-list li.user-card div.cell-body a.name {	color: #59A1C7;	width: 130px;	height: 37px;	position: absolute;	padding-top: 13px;	margin-left: -25px;	padding-left: 25px;}div.tabs-content div.main-left ul.members-list li.user-card div.cell-body span.user-points {	color: #1F3F58;	border: none;	padding: 0;	background: none;	margin-top: 26px;	position: absolute;}div.tabs-content div.admin-side-left {	width: 200px;}div.tabs-content div.admin-side-left .tabs-vertical  {	border: none;}div.tabs-content div.admin-side-left .tabs-vertical .tab.active {	border-color: #59A1C7;	color: #59A1C7;}div.tabs-content div.admin-main-right {	width: 550px;	margin-right: 50px;}div.tabs-content div.admin-main-right div.members-container ul.admin-users-list li.admin-user-item {	background: white;	padding: 0 10px;	height: 35px;}div.tabs-content div.admin-main-right div.members-container ul.admin-users-list li.admin-user-item:hover {	background: #39D1B4;}div.tabs-content div.admin-main-right div.members-container ul.admin-users-list li.admin-user-item:hover a.user-link {	color: white;}div.tabs-content div.admin-main-right div.members-container ul.admin-users-list li.admin-user-item a.user-link img.avatar {	border-radius: 1000px;	background: none;}div.tabs-content div.admin-main-right div.members-container ul.admin-users-list li.admin-user-item a.user-link span.light-text {	padding-left: 5px;}div.tabs-content div.admin-main-right div.members-container ul.admin-users-list li.admin-user-item:hover a.user-link span.light-text {	color: whitesmoke;}div.tabs-content div.admin-main-right div.members-container ul.admin-users-list li.admin-user-item div.accessory-right a.promote-member, div.tabs-content div.admin-main-right div.members-container ul.admin-users-list li.admin-user-item div.accessory-right a.demote-member {	color: #1F3F58;}div.tabs-content
